contentList.content: Nyrulna: Zephyr Connection
This weapon will return to your hand when thrown. You cannot be forced to drop the trident. When thrown, Nyrulna's additional [1] explodes outward in a [2] blast centred on the target.
You may toggle this feature off. When toggled off, Nyrulna's additional [1] is dealt to the target instead of exploding. When Nyrulna returns to your hand it is toggled on again.

Automatically cast Divine Smite when you land a Critical Hit with a melee or thrown weapon attack.

The highest available spell slot will be used to maximise damage.
When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a melee or thrown weapon attack, you deal an extra dice of weapon damage.
You have a +1 bonus to damage with melee and thrown weapons for every turn this condition has remaining.
After a successful attack with a weapon, you can cast illusion or enchantment spells as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.

You've trained to strike swift and true. When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with your melee or thrown main hand attack, you roll an extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical dice.
Pick up an item or creature and throw it at a target, dealing additional damage and potentially knocking it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Attacking Recklessly
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throwing <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> until the end of your turn, but enemies also have Advantage against you.

When you make your first <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throwing Attack Rolls during this turn, but Attack Rolls against you have Advantage until your next turn.
Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">advantage</LSTag> on Melee and Throwing <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> on their turn, and any Attack Roll against them has Advantage.
Backbreaker (Offhand)
Cleave (Offhand)
When you miss a main hand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag>, deal [1] regardless.
Tenacity (Offhand)
When you miss an offhand weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag>, deal [1] regardless.
Concussive Smash (Offhand)
Maiming Strike (Offhand)
Maiming Strike (Offhand)
Disarming Strike (Offhand)
Flourish (Offhand)
Heartstopper (Offhand)
Lacerate (Offhand)
Piercing Strike (Offhand)
Pommel Strike (Offhand)
Sacrifice [1] <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> to deal an additional [2] with your main hand melee weapon this turn.
Deals an additional [1] with main hand melee attacks.
Deal an additional [1] with main hand melee attacks.
Prepare (Offhand)
Deals an additional [1] with off-hand melee attacks.
Prepared (Offhand)
Deal an additional [1] with off-hand melee attacks.
Rush Attack (Offhand)
Topple (Offhand)
Weakening Strike (Offhand)
Hush You! (Offhand)
Corrosive Strike (Offhand)
Bloodletting (Offhand)
Incise Ligaments (Offhand)
Inject Nostrum (Offhand)
Trephination (Offhand)
Frigid Blade (Offhand)

You add your Proficiency Bonus as Cold damage.

When the attack hits, apply Frostbite. The creature takes [1] when making a weapon attack.
Absolute Power (Offhand)
Unwieldy

The oversized weapon you have equipped takes everything you can muster to wield it. You suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> to melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, as well as <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.

Deal additional Radiant damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. On a hit, light erupts on the target, forcing it to make a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> for [2] turns.
Justiciar's Scimitar
You are considered <LSTagTooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this weapon while wielding it.
If you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>, you have a chance of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> your target for [1] turns.

When you heal a creature, it gains the effect of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag> for [1] turns. When you <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_Revivify">Revive</LSTag> a creature it gains the effect of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEATH_WARD">Death Ward</LSTag> for [1] turns.

You gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> after becoming affected by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>, or other druidic forms including <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SYMBIOTIC_ENTITY">Symbiotic Entity</LSTag>. While those temporary hit points are active reduce all incoming damage by [2].

You have a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>. You also have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against spells. This effect persists while under the effects of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>.

When you hit a target with a melee spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag>, you gain [2] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag>.
Whenever you heal a creature it becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Blessed</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Deals an additional [1] to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> targets.

Attacks with this weapon inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Bane</LSTag> upon the target for [1] turns. If the attacker still has 50% or more <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> when <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Bane</LSTag> is inflicted on the target, they take [2].

Once per turn, the blow possibly knocks a foe back [1] unless they succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. If the target is knocked back they must succeed an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stuns</LSTag> for [2]. This has no effect on dragons or Huge creatures.
Deals an additional [1] to Plants, Spiders or small creatures.
Sussur Silence

Targets hit with this weapon must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silenced</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Heat of the Hells
This effect can only trigger once per attack.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with this blade have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets.
Imbued with Hellfire
Damage dealt with this weapon ignores <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to[1].
When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with this weapon, it deals an additional [1] damage.
When you are wielding a melee weapon that is not Two-Handed in one hand, and no weapon in the other, gain a +[1] bonus to melee weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
You can wield a shield and still receive this bonus.
Versatile
This weapon has the <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property.
Versatile Enabled
This weapon's <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property is enabled.
Versatile Disabled
This weapon's <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> property is disabled.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> targets that fail a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> for [2] turns. Deals an additional [1] to certain creatures that sport multiple sets of eyes.
Defender of Easthaven
Reduce incoming Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage by half your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> (rounded down).

Depending on what kind of damage this weapon does, it may also inflict the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLOW">Slowed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ACID">Acid</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> conditions for [1] turns. If the target already has one of the aforementioned conditions, the duration is instead increased by [2] turn.
On a hit, possibly inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Spider Queen's Bite
On a hit, possibly inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Spider Queen's Malice

If the wielder deals Acid, Fire, Lightning, Radiant or Necrotic damage, it becomes Resistant to that damage type for 2 turns.

Creation's Echo gains an additional 1d4 damage, matching the elemental resistance acquired by the wielder.
Acid Resonance
Fire Resonance
Lightning Resonance
Necrotic Resonance
Radiant Resonance
Creation's Echo deals an additional [1].
Ensaring Defence

While under the effects of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_WildShape">Wild Shape</LSTag>, or other druidic forms including <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SYMBIOTIC_ENTITY">Symbiotic Entity</LSTag>, attackers may be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARING_STRIKE">Ensnared</LSTag> for [1] turns if they are not a plant or a beast. This effect scales with your Druid level.

Whenever a creature lands a melee attack on the wearer, that creature takes [1] ([2] on a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>) and may be afflicted with the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ACID">Acid</LSTag> condition for [3] turn. If the attacking creature already has the Acid condition, the duration is instead increased by [1].

This blade's magical powers only function if it's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_BOND">Bound</LSTag> to an Eldritch Knight, a Warlock's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PACT_BLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag>, or a Hexblade's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEXBLADE_BIND">Hexed Weapon</LSTag>.

Deals an additional [1] to creatures that are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="UNCONSCIOUS">Unconscious</LSTag>.
You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrating</LSTag> creatures.
When you deal damage with this weapon, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BARBED_ARROW">Rupture</LSTag> your target for [1] turns.
Attacks with this weapon deal an additional [1], if you attacked with<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Once per turn, after the wearer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashes</LSTag> or takes a similar action, they can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> without using a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Click the heels of your boots to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> as a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag>. You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CLICK_HEELS">Click Heels</LSTag> for [1] turn.

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> using <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag> have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> against this creature.
Knock nearby foes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> for [2] turns, after killing a hostile target or landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with this weapon.

Whenever this weapon lands a critical hit, both target and attacker have to succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or be affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HIDEOUS_LAUGHTER">Hideous Laughter</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Feyvourite Weapon
Redcaps deal an additional [1] with this weapon.
Pendant Of Animal Speech
An Amulet in the shape of a small paw, adorned by a simple gemstone.
Lethal Swiftness

After landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> or killing a hostile creature with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> using a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Structural Decommission
Deals an additional [1] to Constructs, and inanimate objects.
